name: Eight Great Realms of the Dwarves

system.description:
#### Cold Stones Hold
This realm contained all of the Agrash Arms range and Claimed the Corinth Peninsula
**Ruler:** Jarl Jal, Son of Holt, Son of Jorn

#### Black Ore
This realm held the Lackabier Point and Kollish Downs
**Ruler:** Jarl Brann, Son of Aune, Son of Kjell

#### Whitglas Peak
This realm stretched from the Center of the Lackabier peaks, to the peninsula of the east.
**Ruler:** Jarl Aulg, Son of Ness, Son of Olav, Thain
 
#### Deep Waters March
This realm stretched from the Fens of the West, through Griffons Eye and as far south as The tip of the peaks.
**Ruler:** Jarl Hlor, Son of Ols, Son of Ove
**Cities:** SeaHold, Bakars Run, Elsk Isle, Vargs Hollow

#### Blackmouth Weir
This realm ran from the Arbican Delta through the Onseth Jungles.
**Ruler:** Jarl Kulm, Son of Lars, Son of Alf

#### Goldmynd Hallow
This realm nested in the foothills of the Lackabier Range, and across the Orsumnd Valley
**Ruler:** Jarl Frex, Son of Halver, Son of Bragg

#### Greystone Mond
This realm consisted of the Lackabier Handle and parts of the Genmoth plains.
**Ruler:** Jarl Sdor, Son of Peder,  Son of Arne

#### Shirdown
This realm occupied the valley and plains south of Deep Waters, between Agrash arms and the Lackabier range. 
**Ruler:** Jarl Thask, Son of Ander, Son of Eskil
